original_text: You have caused people to insult me, like that proverb says. People even spit at my face. You have caused people to insult me,
korean_text: 하나님이 나를 백성의 속담거리가 되게 하시니 그들이 내 얼굴에 침을 뱉는구나

sentences.original_text: You have caused people to insult me
People even spit at my face
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 심지어 내 얼굴에 침을 뱉습니다

sentences.original_text: You have caused people to insult me
